siteMetadata.title: Kasper Zutterman
siteMetadata.subtitle: Kasper Zutterman's personal website, he is a Information Engineering Technology Master's Student at Ghent University.

frontmatter.title: My Open Summer of Code 2020 experience
frontmatter.description: In this article we'll explore a range of techniques and algorithms to determine the similarity between items. We will also explain the how and the why, and have a look at some use cases.
